welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Olgiate Olona, the charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer. Buon viaggio!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used mainly for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lugano Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
